hypothesis_content.title: MSTR Extreme Divergence from NAV Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates from its implied Bitcoin-NAV by more than 25% (premium or discount), it will revert towards its NAV over the following 10 trading days, provided the crypto market (BTC) is in a NEUTRAL or BULL regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a leveraged Bitcoin proxy. Extreme premiums suggest euphoric speculation, while extreme discounts suggest panic or technical selling unrelated to the underlying asset. In stable or bullish crypto regimes, arbitrage forces (creation/redemption of related instruments, relative value traders) and investor reallocation should work to close the gap.
entry_conditions: BTC regime is NEUTRAL or BULL
Implied NAV is calculated as (BTC Holdings * BTC Price) / Shares Outstanding
Entry at the market close when the condition is met

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Deviation expands by an additional 10 percentage points (e.g., from 25% to 35%)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The median reversion over the 10-day period is less than 5% of the initial deviation magnitude across 20+ signals.
